Translations.Text: Xindao zhe, youtai jiaotu, jidu jiaotu, bai xing jiaotu, fan xin zhenzhu he mori, bingqie xingshan de, jianglai zai zhu nali bidei xiangshou ziji de baochou, tamen jianglai meiyou kongju, ye bu youchou.
Dangshi, wo yu nimen diyue, bing jiang shan shuli zai nimen de shangmian, wo shuo: Nimen dang jianshou wo suo ci nimen de jingdian, bingqie dang laoji qizhong de lu li, yibian nimen jingwei.
Yihou, nimen beipan. Jiaruo meiyou zhenzhu shangci nimen de enhui he ci'en, nimen biding bian cheng kui she zhe.
Nimen que yi renshi nimen zhong youxie ren, zai anxiri chaoyue fadu, guwo dui tamen shuo: Nimen bian cheng beijian de yuanhou ba.
Wo yi zhe zhong xingfa wei qian ren he hou ren de jie yu jingwei zhe de jiaoxun.
Dangshi, mu sa dui ta de zongzu shuo: Zhenzhu dique mingling nimen zai yitou niu. Tamen shuo: Ni yunong women ma? Ta shuo: Wo qiu zhenzhu baoyou wo, yimian wo bian cheng yuren.
Tamen shuo: Qing ni ti women qingqiu ni de zhu wei women shuoming na tou niu de qingzhuang. Ta shuo: Wo de zhu shuo: Na tou niu que shi bulao bu shao, nianling shizhong de. Nimen zunming er xing ba!
Tamen shuo: Qing ni ti women qingqiu ni de zhu wei women shuoming na tou niu de maose. Ta shuo wo de zhu shuo: Na tou niu maose chun huang, jian zhe xiyue.
Tamen shuo: Qing ni ti women qingqiu ni de zhu wei women shuoming na tou niu de qingzhuang, yinwei zai women kan lai, niu dou shi xiangsi de, ruguo zhenzhu yiyu, women bi huo zhidao.

Ta shuo: Wo de zhu shuo: Na tou niu bushi shouguo xunlian de, ji bu geng tiandi, you bu zhuan shui che, que shi quanmei wu ban de. Tamen shuo: Xianzai ni jieshi zhenxiangle. Tamen jiu zaile na tou niu, dan fei chu ziyuan.
